para_sentences.para_0: In this module, we'll discuss a few more problems that can be solved with the Greedy Technique ( CLO6 ).
After successful completion of this module, you should be able to do the following (in addition to answering the questions listed below):

ol_0: Implement a Greedy algorithm ( CLO6 )   How to identify if an algorithm can be solved using Greedy technique? How to approach the design of a greedy algorithm? How to implement the Greedy algorithm technique?
How to identify if an algorithm can be solved using Greedy technique?
How to approach the design of a greedy algorithm?
How to implement the Greedy algorithm technique?

para_sentences.para_0: Use the pages within this module to explore the following concepts:
Please make sure to complete the following assignments and other tasks:

ul_0: Complete the recommended but optional activities within the exploration pages
Review material from week 1-5 Explorations  videos  quizzes and assignments for the Midterm (excluding the topic on Greedy technique)
